Text:
(Beta and Epsilon have brought vital information
back from the City-State Alliance...)

(Ancient tablets and scrolls detailing the ongoing
history and deeds of the Templars.)

(A hidden organization has been working out of
Orum to root out and punish heretics since
ancient times.)
Lady Alpha, you look troubled.
Do you have anything new to report, Zeta?
New to report? I was on a break until yesterday...
What?!
...My apologies. I've been distracted.

No, no, that's fine. But, you aren't your usual
self, Lady Alpha.

I suppose that I've just realized our opponents are
trickier than expected.
You mean the Templars?

We can't confirm that the Templars are connected to
the Cult of Diablos.

Even if we buy that talk about them being under a
different chain of command, we have to assume
there are factions working together through the
Holy Teachings.

And it is said that Templars kill every Cultist they
meet.

Was that when you laid that trap at the hideout in
the Sacred Land of Lindwurm?

Yes. I'm trying to keep anyone from talking. It's not
so easy to take care of collaborators, though.

Maybe the Cult and Templars aren't working as
closely together as they seem.
And, Lady Alpha, you are worried about that?

I am. It would be much easier to deal with them if
they were the same organization.

And since we surely can't use them as allies, we're
just going to face more enemies...is my thinking.

So you mean, even if they're not together, both the
Cult and the Templars will oppose us?

Beta and Epsilon gathered a lot of useful intel
during their latest scouting trip.

On the other hand, we also have to assume that
the Templars have discovered the Shadow
Garden's existence.

We can't figure out their relationship, but we
also can't be sure they won't work together
against us.

So, as leader, you do really have to consider all the
possibilities... It's dangerous for the Garden.

Zeta, I know you just got off a break, but can I ask
you to go back out to gather intel?
Of course. What's the mission target?
It's the cathedral in the Holy State of Orum.

Hm. So, a quick and dirty run through their base?
I like it when you don't hold back, Lady Alpha.

I'm looking for material on Templar activity, and
documents on relationships with the Cult. Is
that the idea?
It'll be a tough job. Can you do it?
Oh, yeah, leave it to me. I'm going to enjoy this!

...The Holy State of Orum is in the trade city of
Glasheim, isn't it?

Yes. The Holy State consists of the grounds covered
by the cathedral and connected facilities. Together
they make up a small nation.

Every weekend, pilgrims from all over the world
gather for prayers there.

It seems quite a few therianthropes join, too, so
you can easily blend into the crowd to get inside
the cathedral.

Ugh, so I've got to listen to some sermon about the
"Gracious Goddess Beatrix" and all? I suddenly feel
a bit less enthusiastic.
Are you not a fan of the Church's goddess, Zeta?

Let's just say, when I really needed it, no goddess
came to me with salvation.
And if there are any other deities, then...
Then...?
...N-Nothing. I'd better go get ready.
Zeta...
